name: Iron Sword
description: A basic iron sword suitable for beginners
looks: The Iron Sword has a straight blade made of iron with a simple hilt made of leather. The pommel is rounded and the guard is basic and functional.

name: Iron Sword
description: A simple iron sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is made of leather-wrapped iron and has a simple crossguard.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when equipped.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy gauntlets made of steel, providing excellent hand protection.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of thick steel plates, covering the hands and extending up to the forearm. They have reinforced knuckles and adjustable straps for a secure fit.

name: Sword of the Undead
description: A sword imbued with dark magic, said to be able to drain the life force of its enemies.
looks: The Sword of the Undead has a black, ornate hilt with ruby red gemstones embedded in it. The blade is curved and made of a dark, shimmering metal that seems to glow with an eerie light.

special_weapon_skills.Life Drain: Allows the wielder to drain the life force of enemies with each successful attack, restoring a percentage of their own HP.

special_effects.Shadowstrike: Grants a chance to inflict extra dark damage on enemies when attacking from the shadows.

name: Staff of Lightning
description: A wooden staff imbued with the power of lightning.
looks: The Staff of Lightning is made from a smooth, dark wood with intricate carvings along its length. The top of the staff is adorned with a crystal that pulsates with electrical energy.

special_weapon_skills.elemental_mastery: Increases the damage of lightning spells by 10%.

special_effects.eletric_shock: Chance to shock enemies with lightning damage on critical hits.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: A pair of sturdy gauntlets made from steel
looks: The gauntlets are made of smooth steel with a silver tint. They have reinforced knuckles and finger guards.

name: Moonstone Staff
description: A powerful staff infused with the energy of the moon.
looks: The Moonstone Staff is a long staff made of polished oak wood. The top of the staff is adorned with a large moonstone gem that emits a soft glow.

special_weapon_skils.staff_skill: Grants a bonus to Staff skill when used.

special_effects.moonlight_beam: Chance to cast a powerful moonlight beam that damages enemies.

name: Steel Helmet
description: A sturdy helmet made of steel.
looks: The helmet is made of smooth steel with a silver tint. It has a visor that can be opened and closed.

name: Flame Sword
description: A sword infused with the power of fire, capable of dealing burning damage to enemies.
looks: The Flame Sword has a long, curved blade that glows with a fiery red color. The hilt is wrapped in leather and has intricate designs of flames etched into it.

special_weapon_skils.fire_magic: Allows the use of fire magic spells with increased effectiveness.

special_effects.burning_damage: Inflicts burning damage on enemies, causing additional damage over time.

name: Obsidian Greatsword
description: A massive sword crafted from obsidian, known for its devastating cutting power.
looks: The Obsidian Greatsword is an imposing weapon, with a long, straight blade made entirely of obsidian. The hilt is wrapped in thick leather for a secure grip, and the pommel is adorned with intricate carvings.

special_weapon_skils.greatsword_mastery: Increases damage dealt with greatswords by 25%.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: A pair of gauntlets made from durable steel, providing excellent hand protection.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of thick plates of steel, covering the hands and extending up to the forearms. They have intricate engravings and reinforced knuckles.

name: Golden Ring
description: A shiny golden ring adorned with intricate engravings.
looks: The golden ring has a polished surface that reflects light, giving it a radiant appearance. It is engraved with delicate patterns and designs.

special_effects.luck_boost: Grants a bonus to Luck stat.

name: Warhammer
description: A large, two-handed hammer designed for crushing opponents with powerful blows.
looks: The head of the warhammer is made of solid steel, with a flat surface on one side and a spike on the other. The handle is made of sturdy wood and wrapped in leather for a firm grip.

special_weapon_skills.crushing_blow: Has a chance to stun the target for a brief period of time.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: A pair of sturdy gauntlets made of steel.
looks: The steel gauntlets are crafted from thick steel plates, providing excellent protection for the hands and wrists. They have intricate engravings along the edges and reinforced knuckles.
